---
<!-- we make the data here -->

```{r filterdata}
# getting the data
namedata <- babynames %>%
  filter(name == params$name1 | 
           name == params$name2) %>% 
  filter(sex == "F") 
```

<!-- get and see top years for each name -->

```{r gettopyears}
topyears <- namedata %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  top_n(1, prop) 
```

---
```{r topyear-name1}
topyears %>% 
  filter(name == params$name1)
```


```{r topyear-name2}
topyears %>% 
  filter(name == params$name2)
```

---
<!-- plot name popularity over time -->


```{r}
ggplot(namedata, 
  aes(x = year, 
      y = prop,  
      group = name, 
      color = name)) + 
  geom_line() 
```
